title: Script font
content:
Anybody recognize this one ??

Thx in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621134654im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LP_6125.jpg)
author: Raf

comments.content:
Young Baroque by Doyald Young.

- Mike Yanega

Here is a [link to the font](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621134654/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/young-baroque/).

- Mike Yanega

Thanks Mike,

it's actually Young Baroque with Palace script and then slanted ...

Raf, you are quite right. Shame on me for seeing the initials and not checking the lower case more closely. That was sloppy work on my part.

- Mike Yanega
Haha, what was that? a trick question? :D

Actually, I thought it was a good lesson. I suspect we've all done the same thing, but I know I've done it a few times. Always check both the initials and the lower case letters. With scripts especially, it's not that rare to find them mixed.

- Mike Yanega

No Problem Mike,

you lead me in the right direction ;-)
